text: Juna manisaharu asthavana chan ra asala kama gardachan tiniharumathi yasta kuraharuko papa lagdaina ki tiniharu kha'ipi'i raheka chan jaba ki tiniharu atmasanyama ra astha rakhdachan ra satkarma gardachan. Ra tyasa pascata punah sanyamako satha visvasa gardachan, bhane punah sanyamako asala kamaharu garirahanchan. Allaha yasta satkarmiharula'i mayam gardacha
